title: Create agent role documentation (MD files)
description:
Create markdown documentation files for each AI agent role that works with the Moe board system.

**Files to create:**
1. docs/agents/ARCHITECT.md - Planning role
2. docs/agents/WORKER.md - Implementation role
3. docs/agents/REVIEWER.md - QA/Review role (includes unit testing)

**Each file should document:**
- Role purpose and responsibilities
- Which MCP tools the role uses
- Ticket/task flow and status transitions
- How to claim and work on tasks
- Example prompts for starting the agent
- Interaction with human oversight
definitionOfDone: ARCHITECT.md created with planning workflow documentation
WORKER.md created with implementation workflow documentation
REVIEWER.md created with QA workflow and unit test requirements
All files include ticket flow diagrams (mermaid)
All files include example Claude Code prompts
README in docs/agents/ linking all role files
taskRails: Include actual MCP tool names from MCP_SERVER.md
Document status transitions: BACKLOG → PLANNING → AWAITING_APPROVAL → WORKING → REVIEW → DONE

implementationPlan.description: Create docs/agents/ directory and README.md with overview of agent roles and links to each role file

Create ARCHITECT.md documenting: role purpose (creates implementation plans), MCP tools (moe.claim_next_task with PLANNING status, moe.submit_plan), workflow (claim → investigate → plan → submit), status transitions (PLANNING → AWAITING_APPROVAL), example prompts

Create WORKER.md documenting: role purpose (implements approved plans), MCP tools (moe.claim_next_task with WORKING status, moe.start_step, moe.complete_step, moe.complete_task), workflow (claim → implement steps → PR → complete), status transitions (WORKING → REVIEW), example prompts

Create REVIEWER.md documenting: role purpose (QA and unit tests), MCP tools (moe.claim_next_task with REVIEW status, moe.set_task_status), workflow (claim → review code → run/write tests → approve or reopen), status transitions (REVIEW → DONE or REVIEW → BACKLOG), unit test requirements
Add mermaid flow diagrams to each file showing the complete ticket lifecycle and role handoffs
